response.original_title: Alt-J - Live at Chapelle des Beaux-Arts
response.overview: Alt-J performed a live concert at the Chapelle des Beaux-Arts in Paris in 2015, which was later made available for viewing through La Blogoth√®que. The concert was filmed in a visually stunning setting, with the band performing amidst historical masterpieces within the prestigious art school. The performance included tracks from both their debut album, "An Awesome Wave," and their then-latest release, "This Is All Yours," showcasing their unique blend of electronic alt-rock.  The concert was lauded for its unique atmosphere and the band's ability to connect with the audience despite the lack of extensive banter. The show was described as a "smorgasbord of delights for the ears and eyes," highlighting the visual spectacle of the venue and the band's contrasting future-pop sounds.
response.title: Alt-J - Live at Chapelle des Beaux-Arts
